function alg_LevenMarq_Limit3 ( in  rec_obj,
in  S,
in  Cr,
in  Cm,
in  Ep,
in  Ep_,
in  alfa,
in  beta,
in  u,
in  constrain,
in  lt,
in  ut 
)

alg_LevenMarq_Limit calculates one step of Levenberg Marquard iteration

Parameters:
S sensitivity matrix
Cr vector of capacitances to be measured for current estimation of Ep
Cm vector of measured capacitances
Ep current estimation of permittivity distribution (previous step) in form of column vector
Ep_ previous estimation of permittivity distribution
alfa relaxation factor (step length)
beta acceleration
u Thikonov regularization factor for matrix pseudo inverse
constrain 'constrain' to limit permittivity value
lt lower threshold
ut upper threshold
Return values:
Ep (column vector) new better estimation of permittivity
